document.title: Professor Rip Van Winklestein Applies for a Teaching Job ... and Finds His Disciplines (and Much of Social Science) Have Disappeared
document.abstract: What if you woke up one day and found that your entire discipline, to which you had sacrificed years of your life, had suddenly disappeared … not because it had become obsolete but because it had been replaced by advocacy and indoctrination, and that nobody seemed to notice or care, as if it had happened by design? It happened to me….
